post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

Shipping and insurance is $5.  Or you could choose $1 PWE shipping, which is at your own risk because I can't track it.  Totally your call which you'd prefer.

Hahn SC 150/25 GD $40
Smith Old Mill poor $50
Stovall Sov350 poor (back is a little tacky, but shouldn't stick to anything in a permanent way) $50
Flanagan Old Mill poor/fair $65
Lentz fair $75
Bradley SC 150/25 (crease-free) $45
Raymond GD $40 SOLD
Hinchman VGEX (couple stains, no creases) $50
